price: Ka ce: "Akwai fatan sãshen abin da kuke, nẽman gaggãwarsa, ya kasance yã kuturta* a gare ku."
arabic: قُلۡ عَسَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعۡضُ ٱلَّذِي تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ
footnotes: * Kuturi, shi ne a bãyan wani ya hau dabba ya kuma aza wani a kanta daga bãya gare shi. Kinaya ce na cewa abin yanã kusa gare su ƙwarai, kamar tsakãnin ɗan kuturi da mahayin dabba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul ʿasā an yakūna radifa lakum baʿḍu alladhī tastaʿjilūna
